faq.question: I'm not technical - will this help me?
faq.answer: Absolutely! That's exactly who this is for. AI explains technical concepts in plain language without assuming prior knowledge.

faq.question: Does it work with API documentation?
faq.answer: Yes! Particularly good with API docs. AI explains endpoints, parameters, authentication, and provides usage examples.

faq.question: Can it extract specific requirements?
faq.answer: Yes. Ask questions like 'What are the performance requirements?' or 'What are the security specifications?' to extract specific details.

faq.question: Does it explain diagrams and tables?
faq.answer: AI can read and explain technical tables and some diagrams. Provides context about what data represents and what it means.

faq.question: Can I use it for compliance reviews?
faq.answer: Yes! Many users review technical compliance documents. AI helps identify if specifications meet regulatory requirements.

faq.question: What plans support technical documents?
faq.answer: All plans! Free: 5 docs/month. Starter ($9/mo): 50 docs. Pro ($19/mo): 200 docs with advanced technical analysis.
